ygData.msgSnippet: Ragnar responded coolly. Ragnar: Anout Ten klicks northwest. There is a clearing in that direction. The base is there. ... let him ... through her ... would

Ragnar responded coolly.

Ragnar: Anout Ten klicks northwest. There is a clearing in that
direction. The base is there.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 1/18/03 9:32:18 PM Central Standard Time, 
> wingedwarrior41@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Ragnar: I care not of either Autobot or Decepticon history. I am
> > Ragnar of Clan Ghost Bear. I am a warrior and live as such. Besides,
> > if all decepticons are even twice as powerful as what you seem to be,
> > human from where come from would destroy them still very easily. Even
> > though we are near the base, watch yourself. I can still see you as a
> > threat and either make you an official prisoner or a dead feline.
> > 
> > There was the sound of a dreadful gauss rifle loading. His tone was
> > without discussion and his face told he would not tolerate it anymore.
> > He was way bigger than her and would easily crush her.
> > 
> 
> her optics narrowed. She didn't like that tone, as she growled to
let him 
> know her distaste for the way he spoke to her. Alot was running
through her 
> memory & meta processor or as it was more of a mind now. But she
would just 
> try & cooperate. She knew that she had landed into a mess. & some
how she had 
> to get out of it. 
> 
> She was thinking. she supposed that she would be a prisoner. She
would never 
> have the freedom she knew. She would be trapped, like she had been
in the 
> past. She sighed. Oh, how she ached to return to what she knew. What
she was.
> 
> "How much father?" She growled in annoyance.
